rooms.name: King Room
rooms.description:
Complimentary WiFi, 40-inch TV, mini-fridge, work desk, ergonomic chair

Relax in this stylish 24 sq. m. /258 sq. ft. King Room. Enjoy a restful night's sleep in the luxurious Suite Dreams® by Serta bed.

Work in comfort at the desk with ergonomic chair. Watch a program on the 40-inch LCD TV or surf the web with complimentary WiFi.

This room also features a mini-fridge, adjustable air-conditioning, coffee/tea maker and an iron/ironing board to make you feel at home. Stay connected to the office with our 24-hour business center, which provides complimentary printing, fax and copy machines.

rooms.name: King Deluxe Family Room with Balcony
rooms.description:
Complimentary WiFi, Balcony, Living Area, Sofa bed, mini-fridge, desk, ergonomic chair

Relax in this spacious and stylish 28 sq. m./302 sq. ft. King Deluxe Family Room with living area and balcony. Enjoy a restful night's sleep in the luxurious Suite Dreams® by Serta bed.

Work in comfort at the spacious desk with ergonomic chair. This room features a pull-out sofa bed for the convenience of an extra guest. Watch a program on the 40-inch LCD TV or surf the web with complimentary WiFi.

This room also features a mini-fridge, adjustable air-conditioning, coffee/tea maker and an iron/ironing board to make you feel at home. Stay connected to the office with our 24-hour business center, which provides complimentary printing, fax and copy machines.

Work in comfort at the spacious desk with ergonomic chair. Enjoy watching a program on one of two 40-inch LCD TVs or surf the web with complimentary WiFi.

This room also features a mini-fridge, adjustable air-conditioning, coffee/tea maker and an iron/ironing board to make you feel at home. Stay connected to the office with our 24-hour business center, which provides complimentary printing, fax and copy machines.

rooms.name: King Accessible Room
rooms.description:
Complimentary WiFi, mini-fridge, 40-inch LCD TV, work desk, ergonomic chair

This King room offers the latest in technology and ergonomic comfort. Connecting doors lead to an adjacent room and a specially fit roll-in bathroom with a raised toilet seat, panic cord and lowered sink make the room extremely practical. Additional features include lowered closet shelves and closet rod.

Enjoy a restful night's sleep in the luxurious Suite Dreams® by Serta bed. Work in comfort at the spacious desk with ergonomic chair or relax and watch a program on the 40-inch LCD TV. Complimentary WiFi is also available.

This room also features a mini-fridge, adjustable air-conditioning, coffee/tea maker and an iron/ironing board to make you feel at home.

Any corresponding photo may not reflect the specific accessible room type or room type feature.
